scripts.post-test: npx allure generate ./allure-results --clean && npx allure open ./allure-report
scripts.cleanup: rm -rf allure-results/ && rm -rf allure-report/ && rm -rf playwright-report/ && rm -fr API-TestReport
scripts.e2e-tests: npm run cleanup && npm run tests && npm run post-test
scripts.api-tests-newman: npm run cleanup && newman run ./Newman/Collection/Marvel_API_Challenge_Collection.postman_collection.json -e ./Newman/Environment/Marvel_Env.postman_environment.json -r cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export ./API-TestReport/MarvelAPITestReport.html
